delete.consequences1: You will no longer be able to assign the activity to day models, planning units, or employees.
delete.consequences2: Activities assigned to day models, planning units and employees will remain but will be labeled as deleted.
delete.consequences3: You will no longer be able to replace the activity in a schedule. The activity will still be visible but will be displayed blank.
delete.consequences4: You will no longer be able to insert a shift sequence with a day model that contains the activity.
